\"extendedtooltip.setting.enableMod.desc: Disabilita la mod a livello globale
\"extendedtooltip.setting.extendedLayout: Abilita un secondo layout per mostrare i tooltip in modo più organizzato
\"extendedtooltip.setting.toolSystem.des: Abilita i tooltip per i diversi sistemi di strumenti
\"extendedtooltip.setting.toolSystem.ana: Mostra un indicatore se si costruisce con la modalità anarchia abilitata.
\"extendedtooltip.setting.toolSystem.net: Abilita i tooltip per Strumento di rete
Mostra quale modalità (dritta, curva, ecc.) è in uso.
Aggiunge l'elevazione al tooltip della modalità net tool.
\"extendedtooltip.setting.displayMode.de: Decide between different display modes for the tooltips.
Set the delay the tooltips will show up.
\"extendedtooltip.setting.general.descri: Manage tooltips which show up on multiple entities of the game.
\"extendedtooltip.setting.general.employ: Shows the amount of employees of a building.
\"extendedtooltip.setting.general.effici: Shows the efficiency of building in %.
\"extendedtooltip.setting.general.compan: Shows information about the production of a company.
\"extendedtooltip.setting.citizen.descri: Manage tooltips while hover a citizen.
Shows the current state of the citizen.
\"extendedtooltip.setting.citizen.happin: Shows how happy the selected citizen currently is.
\"extendedtooltip.setting.citizen.educat: Shows the education level of the selected citizen.
\"extendedtooltip.setting.citizen.type.d: Shows which type the selected citizen is.
\"extendedtooltip.setting.park.descripti: Manage tooltips that show information about parks & recreation sites.
\"extendedtooltip.setting.parking.descri: Manage tooltips that show information about parking facilities.
\"extendedtooltip.setting.parking.fees.d: Shows the current fees for parking.
\"extendedtooltip.setting.parking.capaci: Shows the occupied and free parking spaces.
\"extendedtooltip.setting.public_transpo: Manage tooltips that show information about public transportation.
Shows the average waiting time for buildings with stations.
\"extendedtooltip.setting.road.descripti: Manage tooltips while hover over roads.
\"extendedtooltip.setting.road.length.de: Shows the length of the selected road.
\"extendedtooltip.setting.road.upkeep.de: Shows the upkeep costs of the selected road.
\"extendedtooltip.setting.road.condition: Shows the condition of the selected road.
\"extendedtooltip.setting.education.desc: Manage tooltips related to educational buildings.
\"extendedtooltip.setting.education.stud: Shows the currently occupied and available places at schools and universities.
\"extendedtooltip.setting.growables.hous: Shows different numbers to the households of the selected building.
Shows deven more detailed informations to households.
\"extendedtooltip.setting.growables.weal: Shows the current average wealth of the households of a building.
\"extendedtooltip.setting.growables.leve: Shows the level of the selected building.
Shows more info related to level of a building.
\"extendedtooltip.setting.growables.zone: Shows detailed zone information like name, type, level and others.
\"extendedtooltip.setting.growables.rent: Shows the current rent of the selected building.
\"extendedtooltip.setting.growables.bala: Shows the current balance of the selected building.
\"extendedtooltip.setting.vehicle.descri: Manage tooltips while hover over vehicles like Cars, Trucks, Taxis and others.
Shows the current state of the selected vehicle.
\"extendedtooltip.setting.vehicle.driver: Shows driver information of the selected vehicle.
\"extendedtooltip.setting.vehicle.garbag: Shows garbage capacity of the selected garbage trucks.
\"extendedtooltip.setting.vehicle.postva: Shows mail capacity of the selected post vans.
\"extendedtooltip.setting.vehicle.passen: Shows detailed information about the passengers of the selected vehicle.
